meanings.sent1: The winkler greeted me with a friendly wink.
meanings.sent2: The little girl was known as the class winkler for her frequent winks.
meanings.sent3: The winkler at the party made everyone laugh with his playful winks.
meanings.sent4: She was a master winkler, able to convey secret messages with just a wink.
meanings.sent5: The winkler's wink was so sly, it could brighten anyone's day.

meanings.definition: A tool used for bending metal.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic reached for the winkler to shape the metal sheet.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith's winkler was essential for crafting intricate designs.
meanings.sent3: In the workshop, the winkler accidentally bent his own finger instead of the metal.
meanings.sent4: The winkler in the skilled hands of the artisan transformed the metal into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The winkler's precision was unmatched, creating flawless bends in the metal.
